name: Breeze Checkout
author: Juspay Technologies PVT LTD

sections.description:
Breeze 1 CLick Checkout, is built from the ground up for D2C brands to provide their customers an unparalleled checkout experience, offering highest conversion rates in the industry. Your new customers would love shopping on your site as their shipping addresses would be autopopulated from their Breeze Shopping Profile. Breeze is from Juspay that powers payment experience for top consumer apps in India. Connect to 100+ payment gateways/aggregators to give a wide range of payment methods. The orchestration layer allows you to route payments through the right provider (with health signals from a large merchant network) to maintain the highest uptime.

  • True 1 Click checkout experience
  • Wide range of payment methods: UPI, Credit Card, BNPL, Wallets, Gift Card, NB
  • No-code connection with 100+ payment gateways/aggregators
  • Powerful rewards engine to drive order value and volume
  • Superior checkout experience with brand customisation options
  • Enterprise grade analytics and administration dashboard

For more information

Need a demo? We are just a click away!

Terms of Service & Privacy Policy

Our plugin relies on the Breeze hosted service to support its functionality. Specifically, we use the following endpoints for processing payments and logs as part of our internal monitoring process:

  • Sandbox Environment *
    https://api.beta.breeze.in – We utilize this endpoint to collect logs for internal monitoring purposes. These logs play a crucial role in analyzing the performance of our plugin, identifying potential issues, and ensuring the overall reliability of our service. The data collected through this endpoint is used exclusively for internal monitoring and improvement purposes.
    https://app.beta.breeze.in – We utilize this endpoint to collect logs for internal monitoring purposes. These logs play a crucial role in analyzing the performance of our plugin, identifying potential issues, and ensuring the overall reliability of our service. The data collected through this endpoint is used exclusively for internal monitoring and improvement purposes.
    https://sdk.breeze.in/electron/151.0.0/index.js – This endpoint is utilized for loading the script required to inject the payment sheet. This process enables the seamless integration of the payment sheet into our plugin, contributing to a user-friendly and efficient payment interface.

  • Production Environment *
    https://api.breeze.in – We utilize this endpoint to collect logs for internal monitoring purposes. These logs play a crucial role in analyzing the performance of our plugin, identifying potential issues, and ensuring the overall reliability of our service. The data collected through this endpoint is used exclusively for internal monitoring and improvement purposes.
    https://app.breeze.in – We utilize this endpoint to collect logs for internal monitoring purposes. These logs play a crucial role in analyzing the performance of our plugin, identifying potential issues, and ensuring the overall reliability of our service. The data collected through this endpoint is used exclusively for internal monitoring and improvement purposes.
    https://sdk.breeze.in/electron/151.0.0/index.js – This endpoint is utilized for loading the script required to inject the payment sheet. This process enables the seamless integration of the payment sheet into our plugin, contributing to a user-friendly and efficient payment interface.

It’s essential to emphasize that the utilization of these endpoints is limited to specific, well-defined circumstances. We prioritize transparency and assure our users that any data collected is treated with the utmost confidentiality, adhering to industry standards for privacy and security. Our goal is to provide a secure, reliable, and user-friendly payment experience through strategic integration with these services.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/breeze-button directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where are the settings of this plugin ?

Visit “WooCommerce > Breeze”.

Can I use this checkout button on product display page ?

Yes, Breeze checkout button works on product page, mini cart page (cart drawer), cart page and checkout page

Do you support offers?

Yes, Breeze provides full support for Woocommerce offers and more. Your customers can apply both store offers and payment offers in one seamless interface.
